attributes.action: Children to be classed as ADULTS from the age of 18 years old.
attributes.additional_details:
To clarify when a child can be classed as an adult with regards to payments to the CSA.
If you are 18 years old you can legally vote but with the CSA you are still classed as a child at the age of 20yrs.
This e-petition is to get the Goverment to change the age back to 18 Years.
